36#include "krb5_locl.h"
37
38KRB5_LIB_FUNCTION krb5_error_code KRB5_LIB_CALL
39krb5_sock_to_principal (krb5_context context,
40 int sock,
41 const char *sname,
42 int32_t type,
43 krb5_principal *ret_princ)
44{
45 krb5_error_code ret;
46 struct sockaddr_storage __ss;
47 struct sockaddr *sa = (struct sockaddr *)&__ss;
48 socklen_t salen = sizeof(__ss);
49 char hostname[NI_MAXHOST];
50
51 if (getsockname (sock, sa, &salen) < 0) {
52 ret = errno;
53 krb5_set_error_message (context, ret, "getsockname: %s", strerror(ret));
54 return ret;
55 }
56 ret = getnameinfo (sa, salen, hostname, sizeof(hostname), NULL, 0, 0);
57 if (ret) {
58 int save_errno = errno;
59 krb5_error_code ret2 = krb5_eai_to_heim_errno(ret, save_errno);
60 krb5_set_error_message (context, ret2, "getnameinfo: %s", gai_strerror(ret));
61 return ret2;
62 }
63
64 ret = krb5_sname_to_principal (context,
65 hostname,
66 sname,
67 type,
68 ret_princ);
69 return ret;
70}
71
